text: The 2017–18 2. Bundesliga was the 44th season of the 2. Bundesliga. It began on 28 July 2017 and concluded on 13 May 2018. The fixtures were announced on 29 June 2017. ==Teams== ===Team changes=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Promoted from 2016–17 3. Liga !! Relegated from 2016–17 Bundesliga !! Promoted to 2017–18 Bundesliga !! Relegated to 2017–18 3. Liga !!
